FAQ:
Q: Do you offer Softaculous?
A: Yes, it is available.



Q: What is your average setup time?
A: Instant Activation.



Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2015. Yes, we are new in business but you won't feel it with our service. 



Q: Do you allow proxy sites?
A: We allow private proxy sites. We do not permit public proxy sites.



Q: Do you make backups of all websites?
A: Yes, with Liveinhost we maintain backups. We do, however, always recommend keeping your own backups in addition to ours.



Q: Is there an additional fee for cPanel?
A: The packages which list cPanel the title include the license for the control panel.



Q: Can you assist transferring our existing data?
A:  Yes, in most cases we can transfer your existing data to your cPanel account from another provider for free.
